secondaryItems.caption: Old Mill House and Forebay looking north, 1875.  Force main pipes carried water from Turbine pumps to the Reservoir. These were removed shortly after the Fairmount Water Works was shut down in 1909. Wheels were used to control opening and closing of water flume gates.
secondaryItems.name: LC1
secondaryItems.credit: Photo Courtesy of Philadelphia Water Department Archives

secondaryItems.caption: Forebay was filled in 1920 to a grade higher than the deck of the Old Mill House, trees were planted, and a street was created (Aquarium Drive) for access to the Aquarium. 1930
secondaryItems.name: LC2
secondaryItems.credit: Photo Courtesy of City of Philadelphia Archives

secondaryItems.caption: The Old Mill House in the midst of a major stabilization effort. 1987
secondaryItems.name: LC4
secondaryItems.credit: Photo by C. Drew Brown, Courtesy of Philadelphia Water Department Archives

secondaryItems.caption: Restoration in process, 1999
secondaryItems.name: LC6
secondaryItems.credit: Photo by Nan Herson and Courtesy of Philadelphia Water Department Archives

secondaryItems.caption: Old Mill House and deck structures from New Mill House, 1978. Fairmount Water Works was allowed to deteriorate. Exteriors were marred by graffiti and needed maintenance. The Cliffside Paths, overgrown and missing railings, were a safety hazard.
secondaryItems.name: RC9
secondaryItems.credit: Photo by Jack E. Boucher, Courtesy of Fairmount Water Works Recording Project, HAER, 1978, Library of Congress

secondaryItems.caption: Engine House deck with Water Works Café, from South Garden, 1979. The Junior League of Philadelphia operated the Water Works Café in the Engine House from 1979 to 1981. It closed after a fire damaged part of the interior.
secondaryItems.name: RC5
secondaryItems.credit: Photo by Jim Aleo, Courtesy of Philadelphia Water Department Archives

secondaryItems.caption: Restoration began in earnest in the 1990s. The Fairmount Water Works Interpretive Center opened in Machine Level of Engine House and portion of Old Mill House in 2003.
secondaryItems.name: RC12_FWW_Vision
secondaryItems.credit: Rendering Courtesy of the Fairmount Water Works A Vision of the Future, 2014.
